errors.error_description: References a requirements.txt file that doesn't exist in the repository
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install -r requirements.txt line entirely
Create a requirements.txt file with necessary dependencies
Replace with pip install civet command
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install -r requirements.txt line entirely

errors.error_description: Installing dependencies before creating and activating virtual environment
correction_candidates: Move virtual environment activation before pip install commands
Create virtual environment with python -m venv venv first
Use conda environment instead of venv
errors.golden_answer: Move virtual environment activation before pip install commands
